title: Senior Frontend Developer (React)
description:
Join Innovatech Solutions as a Senior Frontend Developer and lead the charge in building next-generation web applications. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality user interfaces using React, TypeScript, and modern frontend technologies.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop new user-facing features using React.js and TypeScript.
  • Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.
  • Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
  • Optimize components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers.
  • Collaborate with backend developers and UI/UX designers.

Requirements:

  • 5+ years of experience in frontend development.
  • Strong proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Redux/Zustand.
  • Experience with RESTful APIs and modern authorization mechanisms.
  • Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools (Vite, Webpack).
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

title: Backend Developer (Python/Django)
description:
DataDriven Inc. is seeking a skilled Backend Developer proficient in Python and Django to join our dynamic team. You'll be instrumental in developing and maintaining robust server-side logic, APIs, and database integrations for our cutting-edge analytics platform.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement scalable backend services and APIs.
  • Work with PostgreSQL databases, optimizing queries and schema design.
  • Integrate with third-party services and front-end applications.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code.
  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to team best practices.

Qualifications:

  • 3+ years of backend development experience with Python/Django.
  • Solid understanding of RESTful API design principles.
  • Experience with relational databases, particularly PostgreSQL.
  • Familiarity with Celery, Redis, and cloud platforms (AWS/GCP) is a plus.

title: Full Stack Engineer (Node.js & Vue.js)
description:
CloudSphere is looking for a versatile Full Stack Engineer to build and scale our cloud management platform. This role involves working on both our Node.js backend and Vue.js frontend, contributing to all phases of the development lifecycle.

What you'll do:

  • Develop and maintain features across the full stack.
  • Design and consume RESTful APIs.
  • Write unit and integration tests.
  • Work in an Agile environment.

What you'll bring:

  • Proficiency in Node.js, Express.js, Vue.js, and related ecosystems.
  • Experience with MongoDB or other NoSQL databases.
  • Understanding of microservices architecture.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
SecureNet Solutions is hiring a DevOps Engineer to enhance our CI/CD pipelines, manage our cloud infrastructure (AWS), and ensure the reliability and scalability of our security products. You'll work closely with development teams to automate and streamline operations.

Responsibilities:

  • Manage and improve CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI).
  • Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation).
  • Containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes).
  • Monitoring and logging (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack).

Requirements:

  • Strong experience with AWS services.
  • Proficiency in scripting languages (Bash, Python).
  • Solid understanding of networking and security principles.

title: UI/UX Designer
description:
CreativeMinds Studio is seeking a talented UI/UX Designer to create intuitive and engaging user experiences for our diverse range of web and mobile applications. You will be involved in the entire design process, from user research and wireframing to prototyping and visual design.

What we're looking for:

  • A strong portfolio showcasing your UI/UX design skills.
  • Proficiency in design tools like Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD.
  • Experience with user research and usability testing.
  • Ability to create wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

title: Data Scientist
description:
Alpha Analytics is looking for a Data Scientist to develop machine learning models, perform statistical analysis, and extract insights from large datasets. You will contribute to projects that drive business decisions and product innovation.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and deploy machine learning models.
  • Perform data mining and statistical analysis.
  • Visualize data and communicate findings to stakeholders.
  • Collaborate with engineers to integrate models into production systems.

Qualifications:

  • MSc or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field.
  • Proficiency in Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow/PyTorch).
  • Experience with SQL and big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop) is a plus.

title: Technical Writer (Software)
description:
DocuTech Solutions is seeking a clear and concise Technical Writer to create high-quality documentation for our software products. This includes API documentation, user guides, tutorials, and release notes. You'll work closely with engineers and product managers.

Key Skills:

  • Proven experience in technical writing for software.
  • Ability to explain complex technical concepts clearly.
  • Familiarity with Markdown, Git, and documentation tools (e.g., Sphinx, ReadMe.com).
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

title: Junior Software Engineer (Java)
description:
Enterprise Systems Ltd. is looking for an enthusiastic Junior Software Engineer to join our Java development team. This is a great opportunity to learn and grow while working on large-scale enterprise applications. Mentorship will be provided.

What you will learn:

  • Core Java, Spring Framework, and related technologies.
  • Database design and SQL.
  • Agile development methodologies.
  • Best practices in software engineering.

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
  • Basic understanding of Java and object-oriented programming.
  • Eagerness to learn and contribute.

title: Product Manager - Mobile Apps
description:
Appify Inc. is a leading mobile app development company seeking an experienced Product Manager to drive the strategy and execution for our flagship mobile applications. You will own the product roadmap, define features, and work with cross-functional teams to deliver outstanding user experiences.

Responsibilities:

  • Define and champion the product vision and strategy.
  • Conduct market research and competitor analysis.
  • Gather and prioritize product and customer requirements.
  • Work closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams.

Qualifications:

  • 3+ years of product management experience, preferably with mobile apps.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Experience with Agile methodologies.

title: Marketing Specialist (Digital)
description:
GrowthHackers Co. is looking for a creative and data-driven Digital Marketing Specialist to develop and execute online marketing campaigns. You will manage SEO/SEM, social media marketing, email campaigns, and content marketing to drive brand awareness and lead generation.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Plan and execute all digital marketing, including SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and display advertising campaigns.
  • Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns.
  • Identify trends and insights, and optimize spend and performance based on the insights.

Requirements:

  • Proven working experience in digital marketing.
  • Experience with Google Analytics, Google Ads, social media advertising platforms.
  • Strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking.

title: Customer Support Specialist
description:
HelpDesk Heroes is seeking a patient and empathetic Customer Support Specialist to assist our users via email, chat, and phone. You'll be the first point of contact for troubleshooting issues and providing solutions.

You are:

  • An excellent communicator, both written and verbal.
  • Tech-savvy and able to learn new software quickly.
  • Passionate about helping people.
  • Able to work independently in a remote setting.

Bonus points:

  • Experience with Zendesk or similar ticketing systems.
  • Multilingual abilities.

title: Mobile Developer (iOS/Swift)
description:
PixelPerfect Apps is looking for a skilled iOS Developer to create beautiful and performant mobile applications using Swift. You will be involved in the full development lifecycle, from concept to App Store submission.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain iOS applications using Swift and SwiftUI/UIKit.
  • Collaborate with designers and product managers.
  • Write unit tests and ensure code quality.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest iOS technologies.

Requirements:

  • 2+ years of iOS development experience.
  • Proficiency in Swift and relevant Apple frameworks.
  • Experience with RESTful APIs and Git.

title: Cloud Solutions Architect
description:
InfraCloud Global is seeking an experienced Cloud Solutions Architect to design and implement scalable and resilient cloud solutions for our enterprise clients, primarily on AWS and Azure. You will provide technical leadership and guidance throughout the project lifecycle.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and deploy cloud architectures based on client requirements.
  • Advise on cloud best practices, security, and cost optimization.
  • Lead technical discussions and presentations.
  • Develop proof-of-concepts and prototypes.

Qualifications:

  • 5+ years in cloud architecture or related roles.
  • Deep expertise in AWS and/or Azure services.
  • Relevant certifications (e.g., AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Azure Solutions Architect Expert) are highly desirable.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description:
CyberGuardians Inc. is looking for a vigilant Cybersecurity Analyst to monitor, detect, and respond to security incidents. You will be responsible for analyzing security logs, conducting vulnerability assessments, and contributing to our overall security posture.

What you'll do:

  • Monitor security alerts and investigate potential incidents.
  • Perform vulnerability scanning and penetration testing (with guidance).
  • Assist in developing and implementing security policies and procedures.
  • Stay informed about the latest cybersecurity threats and trends.

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Cybersecurity, Computer Science, or a related field.
  • Understanding of common security frameworks (NIST, ISO 27001).
  • Familiarity with SIEM tools and other security technologies.
  • Certifications like CompTIA Security+, CEH are a plus.

title: Sales Development Representative
description:
LeadGen Pro is seeking a motivated Sales Development Representative (SDR) to identify and qualify new sales opportunities. You will be responsible for outbound prospecting, cold calling, and setting up meetings for our Account Executives.

Responsibilities:

  • Research and identify potential customers.
  • Conduct outbound calls and emails to generate leads.
  • Qualify leads and schedule discovery calls/demos.
  • Maintain accurate records in our CRM (Salesforce).

Qualifications:

  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Resilient and not afraid of rejection.
  • Previous sales or customer-facing experience is a plus.
  • Familiarity with CRM software is desirable.

title: Part-Time Graphic Designer
description:
VisualVibes Agency is looking for a creative Part-Time Graphic Designer to assist with various design projects, including social media graphics, website banners, and marketing materials. Approximately 15-20 hours per week.

What you'll create:

  • Engaging social media posts and ad creatives.
  • Website and email marketing visuals.
  • Brochures and digital flyers.

Skills needed:

  • Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
  • A strong portfolio demonstrating your design skills.
  • Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

title: Part-Time Content Writer (Tech Blog)
description:
TechExplained, a popular technology blog, is seeking a knowledgeable Part-Time Content Writer to create engaging and informative articles on various tech topics. Looking for someone who can commit to 2-3 articles per week (approx. 10-15 hours).

Topics include:

  • Software development trends.
  • Gadget reviews.
  • Cybersecurity tips.
  • AI and Machine Learning explainers.

Requirements:

  • Excellent writing and research skills.
  • Ability to explain complex topics simply.
  • Passion for technology.
  • Previous blogging or content writing experience preferred.

title: Part-Time Virtual Assistant
description:
ExecuSupport Solutions provides virtual assistant services to busy professionals. We are looking for a reliable and organized Part-Time Virtual Assistant to handle administrative tasks, scheduling, email management, and light research for our clients. 20 hours/week, flexible schedule during business hours.

Responsibilities:

  • Manage calendars and schedule appointments.
  • Handle email correspondence and organization.
  • Perform online research and data entry.
  • Prepare documents and presentations.

Skills:

  • Excellent organizational and time-management skills.
  • Proficiency in MS Office Suite / Google Workspace.
  • Strong communication skills.
  • Previous VA or administrative experience is a plus.

title: Part-Time Bookkeeper
description:
BalanceIt Books offers bookkeeping services to small businesses. We need an experienced Part-Time Bookkeeper to manage accounts payable/receivable, bank reconciliations, and prepare financial reports for a portfolio of clients. Approximately 10-15 hours per week.

Key Duties:

  • Process invoices and payments.
  • Reconcile bank and credit card statements.
  • Prepare monthly financial statements.
  • Utilize QuickBooks Online or Xero.

Requirements:

  • Proven bookkeeping experience.
  • Proficiency in QuickBooks Online and/or Xero.
  • Strong attention to detail and accuracy.

title: Part-Time Social Media Manager
description:
BuzzWorthy Marketing is seeking a creative Part-Time Social Media Manager to develop and execute social media strategies for our clients. You'll manage content creation, scheduling, community engagement, and performance analytics across various platforms. 15 hours/week.

You will:

  • Create and curate engaging content for Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn.
  • Schedule posts using tools like Hootsuite or Buffer.
  • Monitor social media channels and engage with a_minudiences.
  • Track and report on social media KPIs.

Experience:

  • Demonstrable experience in social media management.
  • Excellent copywriting and visual content creation skills.
  • Familiarity with social media analytics tools.

title: Part-Time Data Entry Clerk
description:
AccuData Services is seeking a detail-oriented Part-Time Data Entry Clerk to accurately input and update information in our databases and spreadsheets. This role requires high accuracy and efficiency. Approximately 10-15 hours per week.

Responsibilities:

  • Enter data from various sources into databases.
  • Verify accuracy and completeness of data.
  • Maintain data integrity and confidentiality.

Requirements:

  • Proven data entry experience or similar role.
  • Fast typing skills and high attention to detail.
  • Familiarity with MS Excel or Google Sheets.

title: Part-Time Online Tutor (Math & Science)
description:
BrightSpark Tutors connects students with qualified online tutors. We are looking for passionate Part-Time Tutors specializing in High School Math and Science subjects. Flexible hours, typically 5-10 hours per week based on student demand.

Subjects Needed:

  • Algebra, Geometry, Calculus
  • Biology, Chemistry, Physics

Qualifications:

  • Strong academic background in Math and/or Science.
  • Previous tutoring or teaching experience preferred.
  • Excellent communication and patience.
  • Reliable internet connection.

title: Part-Time Event Staff
location: Various Locations (City Specific - e.g., Los Angeles, CA)
description:
Premier Events Co. is hiring enthusiastic Part-Time Event Staff for upcoming conferences, festivals, and corporate events in the Los Angeles area. Roles include registration, ushering, and general event support. Hours vary per event.

You are:

  • Reliable and punctual.
  • Customer-service oriented with a friendly attitude.
  • Able to stand for extended periods and work in a fast-paced environment.

Requirements:

  • Previous event or customer service experience is a plus.
  • Flexible availability, including evenings and weekends.

title: Part-Time Research Assistant (Psychology)
description:
A psychology research lab at Stanford University is seeking a Part-Time Research Assistant to support ongoing studies. Responsibilities include participant recruitment, data collection, literature reviews, and basic data analysis. 10-15 hours/week.

Ideal Candidate:

  • Currently enrolled in or recent graduate of a Psychology program.
  • Strong interest in research.
  • Detail-oriented and organized.
  • Familiarity with SPSS or R is a plus.

title: Part-Time Barista
description:
The Daily Grind Cafe is looking for a friendly and skilled Part-Time Barista to craft delicious coffee beverages and provide excellent customer service. Morning and weekend availability preferred. 15-25 hours/week.

Responsibilities:

  • Prepare and serve coffee and other beverages.
  • Operate espresso machine and other cafe equipment.
  • Handle cash transactions and maintain a clean workspace.
  • Engage with customers in a positive manner.

Experience:

  • Previous barista or food service experience preferred.
  • Passion for coffee.

To Apply: Drop resume at The Daily Grind Cafe, 123 Main St, Seattle or email cafejobs@dailygrind.example.com

title: Contract Technical Project Manager (6 Months)
description:
TechBridge Solutions requires an experienced Technical Project Manager for a 6-month contract to oversee the implementation of a new CRM system. You will be responsible for project planning, execution, stakeholder management, and ensuring on-time delivery.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and manage project plans, timelines, and budgets.
  • Coordinate with technical teams, vendors, and business stakeholders.
  • Track progress and report on project status.
  • Manage risks and resolve issues.

Requirements:

  • 5+ years of technical project management experience.
  • Proven experience with CRM implementation projects (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot).
  • Strong understanding of Agile and Waterfall methodologies.
  • PMP certification is a plus.

title: Contract UI Designer (3-Month Project)
description:
StartupX Labs is looking for a talented UI Designer for a 3-month contract to design the user interface for a new mobile application. You will work closely with our product team to create visually appealing and user-friendly designs.

Deliverables:

  • High-fidelity mockups and prototypes.
  • UI style guides and component libraries.
  • Collaboration with developers for implementation.

Skills:

  • Strong portfolio of UI design work, especially for mobile apps.
  • Proficiency in Figma or Sketch.
  • Understanding of mobile design patterns and best practices.

title: Contract DevOps Consultant (Azure Focus)
description:
CloudAdvisors Group needs a Contract DevOps Consultant with strong Azure expertise for a 4-month engagement with a key client. You will be responsible for assessing their current DevOps practices and implementing improvements, focusing on CI/CD, IaC, and monitoring within the Azure ecosystem.

Responsibilities:

  • Azure DevOps pipeline setup and optimization.
  • Implement Infrastructure as Code using ARM templates or Terraform.
  • Configure monitoring and alerting in Azure Monitor.
  • Provide expert guidance and documentation.

Requirements:

  • Extensive experience with Azure DevOps, Azure PaaS/IaaS services.
  • Strong background in CI/CD, IaC, and automation.
  • Excellent consulting and communication skills.

title: Contract Full-Stack Developer (React/Node) - 6 Months
description:
AgileMakers Inc. is seeking a Contract Full-Stack Developer proficient in React and Node.js for a 6-month project to build new features for our SaaS platform. You will be part of an agile team working on both frontend and backend development.

Tech Stack:

  • Frontend: React, Redux, TypeScript
  • Backend: Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL
  • Cloud: AWS

Requirements:

  • 4+ years of full-stack development experience with React and Node.js.
  • Strong proficiency in TypeScript.
  • Experience with RESTful APIs and database design.
  • Ability to work effectively in a remote agile team.

title: Contract Content Strategist (B2B Tech) - 3 Months
description:
InnovateContent Co. is looking for a B2B Tech Content Strategist for a 3-month contract. You will develop a comprehensive content strategy for a new software product, including defining target audiences, key messaging, content pillars, and an editorial calendar.

Deliverables:

  • Content strategy document.
  • Audience personas and journey maps.
  • Editorial calendar for 3-6 months.
  • Recommendations for content formats and distribution channels.

Experience:

  • Proven experience as a content strategist, particularly in B2B technology.
  • Strong understanding of SEO and content marketing principles.
  • Excellent analytical and strategic thinking skills.

title: Contract Business Analyst (Finance Systems) - 4 Months
description:
FinTech Innovators is seeking a Contract Business Analyst for a 4-month project focused on gathering requirements and documenting processes for a new financial reporting system. You will liaise between business stakeholders and the development team.

Responsibilities:

  • Elicit and document business requirements.
  • Create process flows and use cases.
  • Facilitate workshops and meetings.
  • Support UAT and system rollout.

Experience:

  • Strong experience as a Business Analyst in the financial services sector.
  • Familiarity with financial reporting systems and processes.
  • Excellent analytical and communication skills.

title: Contract Technical Recruiter (IT Roles) - 6 Months
description:
TalentSource Tech, a specialized IT recruitment agency, needs an experienced Contract Technical Recruiter for 6 months to help source candidates for various software engineering, DevOps, and cybersecurity roles. High volume, fast-paced environment.

What you'll do:

  • Source and screen candidates using various platforms (LinkedIn Recruiter, job boards).
  • Conduct initial interviews and assess technical skills.
  • Manage candidate pipeline and coordinate with hiring managers.

Requirements:

  • 3+ years of technical recruiting experience.
  • Proven ability to source hard-to-find technical talent.
  • Excellent understanding of IT roles and technologies.

title: Contract Instructional Designer (E-Learning) - 5 Months
description:
LearnWell Solutions creates engaging e-learning content. We are looking for a Contract Instructional Designer for a 5-month project to develop a series of online training modules for a corporate client. You will design storyboards, write scripts, and work with multimedia developers.

Responsibilities:

  • Apply instructional design theories and adult learning principles.
  • Create engaging learning activities and compelling course content.
  • Develop storyboards, scripts, and assessment materials.
  • Collaborate with SMEs and multimedia team.

Skills:

  • Proven experience in instructional design and e-learning development.
  • Proficiency with authoring tools like Articulate Storyline or Adobe Captivate.
  • Strong writing and communication skills.

title: Contract QA Tester (Mobile Games) - 3 Months
description:
GameForge Studios is launching a new mobile game and needs meticulous Contract QA Testers for a 3-month period to identify and report bugs. You will execute test cases, perform exploratory testing, and document issues clearly.

What you'll do:

  • Execute test plans and test cases on iOS and Android devices.
  • Identify, isolate, and report bugs in a bug tracking system (e.g., Jira).
  • Verify bug fixes and perform regression testing.
  • Provide feedback on gameplay and user experience.

Requirements:

  • Experience in QA testing, preferably for mobile games.
  • Strong attention to detail.
  • Familiarity with bug tracking tools.
  • Passion for mobile gaming.

title: Contract Salesforce Administrator (Non-Profit) - 6 Months
description:
HopeFoundation Org, a non-profit, is seeking a Contract Salesforce Administrator for 6 months (part-time, approx. 20 hours/week) to support and enhance their Salesforce instance (NPSP). Responsibilities include user support, data management, customization, and report building.

Key Tasks:

  • User administration and support.
  • Data cleaning, import/export, and maintenance.
  • Customizing fields, objects, workflows, and validation rules.
  • Creating reports and dashboards.

Experience:

  • Salesforce Administrator certification required.
  • Experience with Salesforce NPSP (Nonprofit Success Pack) highly preferred.
  • Strong understanding of Salesforce best practices.

title: Freelance Copywriter (Website Content)
description:
WebWordsmiths is looking for talented Freelance Copywriters to create compelling website content for various clients across different industries. Projects include writing homepages, about pages, service pages, and product descriptions. Pay per project/word.

We need writers who can:

  • Craft clear, concise, and engaging copy.
  • Understand client briefs and target audiences.
  • Write SEO-friendly content.
  • Meet deadlines consistently.

To Apply:

  • Submit portfolio with relevant website copy samples.

title: Freelance Graphic Designer (Logo & Branding)
description:
BrandSpark Design connects businesses with freelance graphic designers for logo design and branding projects. We are seeking experienced designers with a strong portfolio in creating unique and impactful brand identities. Project-based compensation.

Skills Required:

  • Expertise in logo design and brand identity development.
  • Proficiency in Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.
  • Ability to interpret client needs and translate them into visual concepts.
  • Strong communication skills.

Portfolio is a must.

title: Freelance WordPress Developer (Custom Themes)
description:
WPDevConnect is a platform for businesses seeking skilled Freelance WordPress Developers for custom theme development and advanced plugin customization. We are looking for developers with a strong portfolio of bespoke WordPress projects.

Expertise Needed:

  • PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
  • Custom WordPress theme and plugin development from scratch.
  • Experience with popular page builders and frameworks (e.g., Elementor, Beaver Builder, Genesis).
  • Understanding of WordPress security best practices.

title: Freelance Social Media Marketing Consultant
description:
SocialStrategy Experts provides freelance social media marketing consultancy to small and medium-sized businesses. We are looking for experienced consultants to develop social media strategies, manage campaigns, and analyze performance for our clients. Hourly or project-based rates.

Services Offered:

  • Social media strategy development.
  • Content creation and scheduling.
  • Paid social advertising (Facebook/Instagram Ads, LinkedIn Ads).
  • Performance analytics and reporting.

Requirements:

  • Proven track record in social media marketing and consultancy.
  • Expertise across major social media platforms.
  • Strong analytical and communication skills.

title: Freelance Video Editor (YouTube Content)
description:
CreatorFlow Studios works with YouTube creators to produce high-quality video content. We are seeking talented Freelance Video Editors proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro to edit vlogs, tutorials, and promotional videos. Per-video or hourly rates.

You should be able to:

  • Edit raw footage into engaging and well-paced videos.
  • Add graphics, text overlays, and sound effects.
  • Color correct and grade footage.
  • Work efficiently to meet deadlines.

Please provide a link to your editing portfolio/reel.

title: Freelance SEO Consultant
description:
RankBoost SEO is looking for experienced Freelance SEO Consultants to help clients improve their search engine rankings. Responsibilities include keyword research, on-page optimization, technical SEO audits, and link building strategy. Project-based or retainer.

Key Skills:

  • Proven experience in SEO with demonstrable results.
  • Proficiency with SEO tools (e.g., Ahrefs, SEMrush, Google Analytics, Google Search Console).
  • Strong understanding of current SEO best practices.
  • Ability to develop and execute effective SEO strategies.

title: Freelance Technical Writer (API Documentation)
description:
DocuGenius specializes in creating clear and comprehensive technical documentation. We need Freelance Technical Writers with experience in documenting APIs (REST, GraphQL) for software companies. Project-based work.

Requirements:

  • Experience writing API documentation for a developer audience.
  • Ability to understand complex technical concepts and explain them clearly.
  • Familiarity with tools like Swagger/OpenAPI, Postman, Markdown.
  • Portfolio of API documentation samples.

title: Freelance Illustrator (Children's Books)
description:
StoryWeaver Press is seeking talented Freelance Illustrators specializing in children's book illustrations. We have ongoing projects requiring various styles. Payment per illustration or per project.

Looking for:

  • A strong portfolio showcasing children's illustration work.
  • Ability to create engaging characters and vibrant scenes.
  • Proficiency in digital illustration tools (e.g., Procreate, Adobe Illustrator).
  • Good communication and ability to work from a brief.

title: Freelance Language Translator (English to Spanish)
description:
GlobalLingua Services provides professional translation services. We are looking for experienced Freelance Translators to translate various documents (legal, marketing, technical) from English to Spanish. Native Spanish speakers preferred. Per-word rate.

Requirements:

  • Native or near-native fluency in both English and Spanish.
  • Proven experience in professional translation.
  • Specialization in legal, marketing, or technical fields is a plus.
  • Attention to detail and cultural nuances.

title: Freelance Virtual Event Moderator
description:
VirtuMeets Pro facilitates engaging virtual events and webinars. We are seeking articulate and tech-savvy Freelance Virtual Event Moderators to manage online sessions, facilitate Q&A, and ensure smooth execution. Hourly rate, project-based.

Responsibilities:

  • Introduce speakers and manage session flow.
  • Moderate Q&A and chat.
  • Troubleshoot basic technical issues for attendees.
  • Ensure a professional and engaging online environment.

Skills:

  • Excellent communication and presentation skills.
  • Experience with webinar platforms (Zoom, Webex, MS Teams).
  • Ability to remain calm and professional under pressure.

title: Software Engineering Intern (Summer 2025)
description:
Innovatech Solutions offers a challenging Summer 2025 Software Engineering Internship. Interns will work on real projects, contributing to our core products under the mentorship of senior engineers. Opportunity to work with technologies like Python, Java, React, or Cloud platforms.

What you'll do:

  • Write and test code for new features or bug fixes.
  • Participate in team meetings and code reviews.
  • Learn about software development lifecycle and agile practices.

Requirements:

  • Currently pursuing a BS/MS in Computer Science or related field.
  • Strong programming fundamentals in at least one language (Python, Java, C++, JavaScript).
  • Enthusiasm for learning and problem-solving.

title: Marketing Intern (Fall 2025)
description:
GrowthHackers Co. is looking for a creative and analytical Marketing Intern for Fall 2025. You will assist our marketing team with digital marketing campaigns, content creation, social media management, and market research. Paid internship.

Responsibilities may include:

  • Assisting with SEO/SEM tasks.
  • Drafting social media posts and blog content.
  • Analyzing marketing data and campaign performance.
  • Conducting competitor research.

Ideal Candidate:

  • Currently enrolled in a Marketing, Communications, or Business program.
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills.
  • Familiarity with digital marketing concepts and social media platforms.
  • Eager to learn and contribute.

title: Data Science Intern (Summer 2025)
description:
Alpha Analytics offers a Summer 2025 Data Science Internship for students passionate about data. Interns will work on projects involving data collection, cleaning, analysis, and basic model building, mentored by experienced data scientists.

What you'll gain:

  • Hands-on experience with real-world datasets.
  • Exposure to Python, R, SQL, and machine learning techniques.
  • Mentorship and professional development.

Requirements:

  • Pursuing a degree in Data Science, Statistics, CS, or a quantitative field.
  • Basic understanding of statistical concepts and programming (Python/R).
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

title: UX Design Intern (Spring 2026)
description:
CreativeMinds Studio is offering a UX Design Internship for Spring 2026. Interns will assist our design team with user research, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing for web and mobile applications. This is a paid internship.

You will learn to:

  • Conduct user interviews and surveys.
  • Create user flows, wireframes, and interactive prototypes (Figma/Sketch).
  • Participate in design critiques and usability testing sessions.

Qualifications:

  • Currently enrolled in a UX Design, HCI, or related program.
  • A portfolio showcasing design projects (coursework or personal).
  • Familiarity with design tools like Figma or Sketch.
  • Passion for user-centered design.

title: Human Resources Intern (Summer 2025)
description:
PeopleFirst Corp is looking for an enthusiastic Human Resources Intern for Summer 2025. The intern will support various HR functions, including recruitment, onboarding, employee engagement initiatives, and HR administration. This is a great opportunity to gain broad HR experience.

Potential Projects:

  • Assisting with screening resumes and scheduling interviews.
  • Helping to organize onboarding materials and sessions.
  • Supporting employee engagement surveys and events.
  • Assisting with HR record keeping and data entry.

Requirements:

  • Currently pursuing a degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
  • Organized and detail-oriented.
  • Interest in a career in HR.
